function_name.description: Unique name for the lambda function

role.description: ARN of the function's execution role

architectures.description: Instruction set architecture for the lambda function

code_signing_config_arn.description: Enables code signing for the function with the given ARN of the configuration

dead_letter_config.description: Dead letter queue configuration that specifies the queue where the lambda sends failed asynchronous events

description.description: Description of what the lambda function does

environment.description: Map of environment variables accessible from the function code during execution. Do not enter AWS secret keys, access keys, or access tokens in this field

ephemeral_storage.description: Amount of ephemeral_storage storage to allocate for the function in MB. Max is 10240

file_system_config.description: Connection settings for an EFS file system

filename.description: Path to the function's deployment package within the filesystem. Exactly one of the filename, image_uri, or s3_bucket fields must be specified

image_config.description: Container image configuration values that override the values in the container Dockerfile

image_uri.description: ECR image URI containing the function's deployment package. Exactly one of the filename, image_uri, or s3_bucket fields must be specified

kms_key_arn.description: ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt environment variables

layers.description: List of Lambda Layer Version ARNs to attach to the lambda function (max of 5)

memory_size.description: Amount of memory in MB the lambda function can use at runtime

publish.description: Whether to public creation/change as new Lambda Function Version

reserved_concurrent_executions.description: Amount of reserved concurrent executions for this lambda function

replace_security_groups_on_destroy.description: Whether to replace the security groups on the function's VPC configuration prior to destruction

replacement_security_group_ids.description: List of security group IDs to assign to the function's VPC configuration before destruction. Replace Security Groups on Destroy must be true to use this field

s3_bucket.description: S3 bucket location containing the function's deployment package. Exactly one of the filename, image_uri, or s3_bucket fields must be specified

s3_key.description: S3 key of an object containing the function's deployment package. Required when S3 bucket field set

skip_destroy.description: Skips deleting the function at destroy time and instead removes function from Terraform state

source_code_hash.description: Virtual attribute used to trigger replacement when source code changes. Must be set to a base64-encoded SHA256 hash of the package file with either filename or s3 key.

snap_start.description: Snap start settings for low-latency startups

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the object

timeout.description: Amount of time the lambda function has to run in seconds

vpc_config.description: Connects to AWS resources in a VPC

timeouts.type: object({create: optional(string), update: optional(string), delete: optional(string)})
